dashboard.title: Orchestrate campaigns with cinematic clarity
dashboard.subtitle: The studio brings campaign prep, session pacing, and follow-up rituals into a single flow. Prioritize the stories that need attention next.

loading_error.title: We hit a snag loading the studio
loading_error.description: Some campaign or session data could not be fetched. Refresh to retry or open the classic dashboard views.

dashboard.feedback_queue_description: Keep safety tools and post-session reflections flowing for every table.

no_sessions.title: No sessions on deck
no_sessions.description: Schedule a new gathering or convert a campaign beat into a live session to keep momentum.

no_campaigns.title: No active campaigns yet
no_campaigns.description: Draft your next narrative arc or revive a past favorite to keep your tables engaged.

no_followups.title: No follow-ups queued
no_followups.description: Once you host a session, we'll surface the debrief, survey, and escalation tasks here.

session_runway.title: Session runway
session_runway.description: Keep your next gatherings sharp with staging cues, visibility, and player load.

campaign_pulse.title: Campaign pulse
campaign_pulse.description: Spot arcs that need outreach, recruitment, or spotlight moments.

labels.collect_safety: Collect safety check-ins and narrative beats from {{count}} players.
labels.capture_highlights: Capture highlights and player energy while the story is fresh.

feedback_triage.title: Keep every table feeling heard and safe
feedback_triage.subtitle: Consolidate post-session surveys, safety escalations, and celebration cues in one board tuned for the Story Guide's rituals.

debriefs.title: Post-session follow-ups
debriefs.description: Debriefs, surveys, and thank-yous queued after your latest gatherings.

empty.title: No follow-ups pending
empty.description: Run a session and we'll surface the debrief tasks immediately after.

safety_checkin.title: Safety & wellbeing
safety_checkin.description: Check-ins, boundaries, and escalation notes that deserve attention.

empty.title: Safety tools all aligned
empty.description: Great work! Keep noting boundaries and tools as your tables evolve.

upcoming_nudges.title: Upcoming touchpoints
upcoming_nudges.description: Pre-session nudges and rituals that prime your storytelling for cinematic delivery.

empty.title: No upcoming sessions queued
empty.description: Schedule your next gathering to unlock prep checklists and reminders.

tasks.collect_surveys: Collect surveys and safety notes from {{count}} players to close the loop.
tasks.capture_boundaries: Capture consent boundaries for the table.
tasks.confirm_safety_tool: Confirm the safety tool you'll facilitate.
tasks.safety_tooling_confirmed: Safety tooling confirmed – share reminders pre-session.
tasks.prep_checklist_detail: Double-check spotlights, props, and pre-session surveys before {{time}}.

expectations.character_creation_placeholder: Capture how characters tie into the world.
expectations.house_rules_placeholder: List safety, dice, or homebrew guidance.

safety.document_boundaries: Document player boundaries and X-card agreements
safety.clarify_absences: Clarify how to handle absences and tardiness

no_sessions_scheduled.title: No sessions scheduled
no_sessions_scheduled.description: Queue the next chapter to keep your players immersed.

no_completed_sessions.title: No completed sessions
no_completed_sessions.description: Once you finish a gathering, we'll spotlight the debrief tasks here.

campaign_workspace.description: Orchestrate this narrative arc, prep rituals, and player energy from a single workspace tailored for the Story Guide.

narrative_brief.subtitle: Keep the campaign spine, table rituals, and prep cues close at hand.

safety_consent.title: Safety & consent
safety_consent.subtitle: Align on tools, boundaries, and reminders before and after each session.

session_pipeline.subtitle: Track what's next and celebrate the story beats you've already delivered.

player_dossiers.subtitle: Keep tabs on who's at the table, their status, and the invitations in motion.

pending_invites.reminder: Send a personal note or reminder to finalize the roster before the next session.

b2b_pipeline.title: B2B collaboration pipeline
b2b_pipeline.subtitle: Follow every corporate opportunity with clear handoffs, story-guide cues, and escalation hooks tied to platform oversight.

focus_cues.title: Focus cues tuned for you
focus_cues.description: Highlight urgent narrative threads, live escalations, and renewals at risk without losing sight of the broader pipeline.

empty_state.title: No active B2B threads yet
empty_state.description: As soon as an opportunity is logged, stages, assignments, and escalation hooks will appear here.

focus_toggle.my_focus_description: Urgent, escalated, or at-risk threads assigned to you.
focus_toggle.entire_pipeline_description: View every in-flight opportunity across teams.

stage.clear_stage: Stage is clear. Stay ready for the next narrative handshake.
stage.no_focus_threads: No urgent focus threads in this stage.

opportunity.studio_note_placeholder: Capture decision cues, safety context, or production blockers.
opportunity.loop_specialists: Loop additional specialists via Platform Admin
